attributes.comment:
Dear Madam/Sir

I heard that you submitted a proposal by US Citizenship and Immigration Services
(USCIS) to increase immigration filing fees by an average of 66%. This is a
very bad news, and it is a WRONG suggestion.

From me, It takes too much time to process the immigration and Citizenship
application is simply your process is too commplicated, not very efficincy.
You'd better simply your process and put a working quata requirment on your
processing stuff, to be honest, I really doubt if your immigration officers are
really working hard to process the applications ...

As an foreign engineer, I absolutely opposes your proposal to increase fee. This
is a BAD idea, please do not do it!!!!!!

Thanks,

Fen

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Fen Lee
